error: `LITE_RUNTIME` file imported in non-`LITE_RUNTIME` file
  --> heavy2.proto:5:8
   |
 5 | import "lite1.proto";
   |        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  ::: lite1.proto:4:23
   |
 4 | option optimize_for = LITE_RUNTIME;
   |                       ------------ `lite1.proto` set as `LITE_RUNTIME` here
   = help: files using `LITE_RUNTIME` compile to types that use `MessageLite` or
           equivalent in some runtimes, which ordinary message types cannot
           depend on

encountered 1 error
